name: Bug Rave
description:
PRESS W TO ENTER THE RAVE.

In the rave, PRESS R to reenter zen.
Drive with WASD.
Move camera with mouse.
Hold Shift for Turbo.
Eliminate the bugs.
Score will NOT increase after time runs out.
Be sure to click the game or refresh the page if the controls do not seem to work.

LEAVE A COMMENT WITH YOUR BEST SCORE.

Attribution details can be found at the repo:
https://github.com/Costava/bug-rave
